messages.ssml: <speak>Follow local authorities for shelter in place guidelines. In addition, the CDC recommends that you stay home if you are showing signs of <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> or are mildly ill, except to get medical care. If you have <sub alias="covid 19">COVID-19</sub> symptoms, separate yourself from other people and pets in your home.</speak>

speech: Follow local authorities for shelter in place guidelines. In addition, the CDC recommends that you stay home if you are showing signs of COVID-19 or are mildly ill, except to get medical care. If you have COVID-19 symptoms, separate yourself from other people and pets in your home.
